EmailTemplate.subject: Strata + Hadoop World 2013! Build, Create, Do.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank You For Joining Us at Strata + Hadoop World 2013 "Now it’s your turn, create your own vision for being data driven, go out and build that first application — drive real value from your Big Data — and then do it again.” - Josh Klahr, VP Products, Pivotal - in his Strata 2013 Keynote Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We hope you had a great event and were able to visit our booth. Year after year, Strata NYC <http://strataconf.com/stratany2013/> proves to be one of the premier Hadoop experiences. In case you missed it - Pivotal launched 3 Hadoop announcements that will help you achieve true business value:
- Pivotal GemFire XD <http://www.gopivotal.com/pivotal-products/data/pivotal-hd>: The industry’s first platform for closed loop analytics and a real-time data service with Hadoop. - Pivotal Data Dispatch <http://www.gopivotal.com/pivotal-products/data/pivotal-data-dispatch> (in association with NYSE Technologies): Accelerate data-driven business decisions by providing data analytics teams with self-service access to all their data. - Spring for Apache Hadoop, which is bundled with Spring XD <http://projects.spring.io/spring-xd/>, has been certified with Pivotal HD, Hortonworks HDP products and Cloudera CDH products.
Josh Klahr, Pivotal’s VP of Data Products, and Annika Jimenez’s, Pivotal’s Global Head of Data Science, each had stand-out conference presentations. Read about Josh’s Keynote “The Impact and Value of the Data-Driven Enterprise” here <http://blog.gopivotal.com/news-2/josh-klahr-at-strata-the-impact-and-value-of-the-data-driven-enterprise>. Learn about “Disruptive Data Science” through Annika’s Strata presentation here <http://blog.gopivotal.com/news-2/annika-jimenez-on-disruptive-data-science-at-the-strata-conference>.
Visit goPivotal.com/phd <goPivotal.com/phd> to learn more about Pivotal HD (Hadoop Distribution) and start using a free Single Node VM today!
Thank you,
The Pivotal Team
